code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import'./contact.css';import LinkdinIcon from'../../assets/linkedin.png';import NokariIcon from'../../assets/nokari.png';import GithubIcon from'../../assets/github.png';import SkypeIcon from'../../assets/skype.png';import emailjs from'@emailjs/browser';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Contact=()=>{const form=useRef();const sendEmail=e=>{e.preventDefault();emailjs.sendForm('service_btne8bz','template_87hho88',form.current,'Z0qqJw2L7NQyP_23H').then(result=>{console.log(result.text);e.target.reset();alert('Email Sent');},error=>{console.log(error.text);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"contactPage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"contact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"contactPageTitle",children:"Contact Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"contactDecs",children:"Please fill out the form below to discus any work opportunities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"contactForm",ref:form,onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"name",placeholder:"Your Name",name:"your_name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"email",placeholder:"Your email",name:"your_email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"msg",name:"message",rows:"6",placeholder:"Your message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",value:"Send",className:"submitBtn",children:"Submit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:LinkdinIcon,alt:"Linkdin",className:"link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:NokariIcon,alt:"Nokari",className:"link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:GithubIcon,alt:"Github",className:"link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:SkypeIcon,alt:"Skype",className:"link"})]})]})]})});};export default Contact;
